title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Launchers and Weapons Facilities in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Attack on a launcher from which launches were made towards the Avivim area and an attack on a weapons storage facility and terror infrastructure; the IDF continues to strike in southern Lebanon.

Aircraft attacked earlier today a launcher of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Yaron area of southern Lebanon, from which launches were made towards the Avivim area.

In addition, fighter jets attacked earlier today a weapons storage facility in the Ramiah area, alongside a military structure in the Hula area and terror infrastructure in the Itarun area.

Following alerts triggered by rocket and missile fire in Margaliot at 19:31, one launch was identified that crossed from Lebanese territory and fell in an open area, with no injuries reported.
Additionally, following alerts triggered by rocket and missile fire in Metula at 21:09, about ten launches were identified that crossed from Lebanese territory, with no injuries reported.

Attached is documentation from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3XnrO5C
